resourceTemplates.name: search-photos
resourceTemplates.title: Search photos
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches a collection of photos from Pexels based on the specified search query, pagination, orientation, and size parameters.

resourceTemplates.name: search-videos
resourceTemplates.title: Search videos
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a collection of videos from Pexels using the given search query, pagination, orientation, and size parameters.
